articles.title: ‘Kill the liberals’: Watertown resident reports flyers with violent message
articles.description:
The Watertown resident, who had a political sign in their yard, told police they found a handwritten page in sharpie that said “Save America, kill the liberals.” 

The post ‘Kill the liberals’: Watertown resident reports flyers with violent message appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.description:
